item.title: Ladyhawke1990 add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "Nobody can buy a hat without gossiping." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Ladyhawke1990 add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "In the land of Ingary where such things as seven-league boots and cloaks of invisibility really exist, it is quite a misfortune to be born the eldest of the three. Everyone knows you are the one who will fail first, and worst, if the three of you set out to seek your fortunes." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Ladyhawke1990 add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Woo woo, secret vampire stuff!" -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Ladyhawke1990 add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Ladyhawke1990 add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Ladyhawke1990 add a quote by Sir Francis Bacon
item.description: "Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly." -- Sir Francis Bacon
